sections.body: During Combat The paladin attempts to stay out of melee, preferring to use cover and attack with her bow.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: A skirmishing crusader often serves as a scout in the army of a noble, or roams the boundaries of civilization, working with rangers to hold the line against evil. She spends her life in the wilds, and as a result can often be awkward and crass.

defensive_abilities: defensive training (+4 dodge bonus to AC vs. giants)
special_qualities: aura, code of conduct, lay on hands (2d6, 6/day), mercy (fatigued)
name: Skirmishing Crusader
